primary.context: Caller provided account number and name upfront
primary.detail: The agent failed to verify the account despite multiple identifiers and transferred the caller to concierge.

steps: Caller requested to make a payment and provided account details.
Agent clarified if payment was for mortgage or maintenance.
Agent attempted lookup by phone number and failed.
Agent requested and received contract ID.
Agent reported a verification issue and transferred to concierge.

failure.detail: Agent failed to locate or verify the account despite the caller providing a specific account number, name, and contract ID.

actions.detail: Lookup by phone numbers provided in Turn 6 failed.
Lookup by contract ID provided in Turn 12 failed.
Transferred to concierge after verification failure.

insights.summary: The caller wanted to pay maintenance fees and provided extensive account information, but the AI was unable to verify the account and transferred the call.
insights.verbatim: I need to speak to a account manager or somewhere I can make a payment on my bill on my SilverSees account number is eight five two one zero zero eight five eight three five six.
insights.coaching: The agent should have been able to locate the account given the specific account number and name provided in the first turn; the system failed to utilize the initial data provided.
